Detailed Description

This is a wrapper facade around a QTCaptureView window or equivalent.

const Value lk::VideoIn::open_preview ( int  x,
int  y 
)

Open a preview window for the video signal. If the window is already open, this method moves it around.

const Value lk::VideoIn::set_device ( const std::string &  device_name)

Select a device from its unique device ID or name.

Returns:
device description on success, an error on failure.
static const Value lk::VideoIn::sources ( ) [static]

List video sources. You can then use the source key or value to open Video streams.

Returns:
a hash describing the video in devices (key = source_id, value = description).
